name: picturebook
description: App for creating public and private stories

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R public dist/public && cp -R views dist/views && cp -R scripts dist/scripts && cp -R routes dist/routes && cp -R config dist/config && cp -R helpers dist/helpers && cp -R middleware dist/middleware && cp -R models dist/models && cp package.json dist/ && cp app.js dist/ && npm install --production

author: Rohit Bisht
